author: user530
title: Documents required to Notary Attest Bachelorhood affidavit
text: India Mike » Community Forums » India Expat Area » Documents required to Notary Attest Bachelorhood affidavit Documents required to Notary Attest Bachelorhood affidavit Please help me on smallest details on how to attest a Bachelorhood affidavit. I know what to print on it After printing i will take it to notary and ask him to attest, but how will he know that I'm actually single or not ? What documents will he ask ? Thank you
